home.title: Solomon Dispute Evidence Uploader
home.intro: This site provides methods for uploading evidence in a purchase/escrow dispute. Intended only for transactions made through the Solomon payment network.
home.wallet: A Metamask account is required to submit links.
home.type: Please select whether you are the buyer or the merchant. Not required for escrow transactions.
home.enter: Enter the transaction ID or contract address. These may be found in the original purchase receipt, or the dispute email notification.

select.title: Select a method for providing evidence.
select.external_text: A publicly visible link to your evidence. It should point to a standard document (e.g. image, PDF, zip file), and must remain available for the duration of the dispute.
select.solomon_text: Upload evidence to our servers. We'll make sure it's available for the duration of the dispute.
select.unavailable: Sorry, this upload method is currently unavailable.

upload.title: External Link Evidence Upload
upload.text1: Use an existing link as evidence
upload.text2: The evidence link must be publicly visible. It should point to a standard document (e.g. image, PDF, zip file), and must remain available for the duration of the dispute.
upload.invalid_url: Please enter a valid URL that starts with http:// or https://
upload.unavailable: Evidence upload is not available yet.
upload.shorten: Use link shortener to save gas
upload.solomon_text1: Upload an evidence file to Solomon's temporary storage. The file will last 30 days.
upload.solomon_text2: Accepted file types: jpg, png, txt, pdf, gif, mp4, zip. Maximum file size: 20MB
upload.browse_file: Or browse to choose a file
upload.change_file: Click "Submit" to upload, or click here to select a different file

contract.title: Submit Evidence to the Blockchain
contract.text1: Connect to MetaMask with the same account used during purchase.

errors.FILE_REQUIRED: Please choose a file to upload
errors.no_metamask: MetaMask must be installed to proceed
